name: We are in war
description:
2016-2021
Acrylic and spray on paper and digital collage.

Humanity has always been at war and it is not by chance that we are divided into different sides to foment this struggle for power.
Which side are you on? What do you fight for? What is your war? What is your enemy, where will the battle be?
These are questions that lead me to reflect and bring up some questions for this new work.

Only one copy of this work will be available for sale. It is not good to proliferate images of war.

2494x2304px
